plot: Penny gets her dream job At "You Saw It On TV", but the boss isn't exactly thrilled with Penny as the New Intern. To keep her job she faces impossible tasks in a world full of colorful characters.
title: The Intern
plot_es: Penny gets her dream job At "You Saw It On TV", but the boss isn't exactly thrilled with Penny as the New Intern. To keep her job she faces impossible tasks in a world full of colorful characters.
